testcase.name: - The API should be able to return a list of all the Star Wars characters
testcase.system-out: Given Get Character request.................................................passed When User calls "GetAllCharacter" with get http request.....................passed Then the api call is success with status code "200".........................passed And "count" in response is "82".............................................passed

testcase.name: - The API should be able to return the details of a specified Star Wars Character
testcase.system-out: Given Get special Character request with "Darth Vader"......................passed When User calls for request with "GetAllCharacter"..........................passed Then the api call for get special character is success with status code "200".passed And name in response should be "Darth Vader"................................passed

testcase.name: - The API should be able to return a list of all the Star Wars planets
testcase.system-out: Given Get Planet request....................................................passed When User calls "GetAllPlanets" api with get http request method............passed Then the api call should be a success with status code "200"................passed And "count" of planets in response is "60"..................................passed

testcase.name: - The API should be able to return the details of a specified Star Wars planet
testcase.system-out: Given Get special planet request with "Dagobah".............................passed When User calls api "GetAllPlanets" to get the desired planet...............passed Then the api call for get special planet is success with status code "200"..passed And Planet name in response should be "Dagobah".............................passed
